miscs.name: NL Spa Reine Flat Mineral Water
NL Spa Reine Flat Mineral Water
33 cl bottle (swing-top) Steinie - Flensburger
miscs.userNotes: Flensburger Brauerei Emil Petersen, Flensburg, Schleswig-Holstein, Germany

hops.notes: Distinctive strong spicy/blackcurrant flavour and good aplha characteristics. A hop of considerable character. It has a strong spicy / blackcurrant flavour and good alpha characteristics. Bramling Cross has now made something of a comeback in traditional cask conditioned beers because of its very distinctive characteristics and has done very well in all styles of beer
hops.name: Bramling Cross
hops.userNotes: Home grown by The Thirsty Otter
